title: Crypto Fund Management Opportunity Could Be Worth as Much as $50B, Bernstein Says
description: The crypto industry is expected to transition into a formal, regulated asset management industry with more than $500 billion of assets over the next five years, the report said.

title: Bitboy’s Ben Armstrong had gun ‘on the back seat’ while arrested ranting on livestream
description:
Ben Armstrong, founder of the popular cryptocurrency YouTube channel BitBoy Crypto, was arrested during a bizarre livestream rant outside a private residence on Saturday. The rambling, one-sided conversation appeared to show Armstrong accosting someone named Carlos Diaz, whom he accused of stealing his Lamborghini and making death threats against him. Armstrong cited various unsubstantiated claims […]

The post Bitboy’s Ben Armstrong had gun ‘on the back seat’ while arrested ranting on livestream appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Trader Joe Submits 1.83 Million ARB Grant Proposal to Arbitrum
description:
Trader Joe, the largest decentralized exchange (DEX) on the Avalanche blockchain, recently submitted a short-term incentive proposal of 1.83 million ARB to Arbitrum, the decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) built on Ethereum. Earlier today, Trader Joe shared a post on X (formerly Twitter) announcing a significant commitment to the Arbitrum ecosystem. The tweet demonstrates Trader Joe’s […]

The post Trader Joe Submits 1.83 Million ARB Grant Proposal to Arbitrum appeared first on Coin Edition.
